pkgmetadata.longdescription: Whale Optimization Algorithm for K-Medoids Clustering // Implements the Whale Optimization Algorithm(WOA) for k-medoids clustering, providing tools for effective and efficient cluster analysis in various data sets. The methodology is based on "The Whale Optimization Algorithm" by Mirjalili and Lewis (2016) doi:10.1016/j.advengsoft.2016.01.008.
